$$id.description: The unique id of the component, mainly used to locate json nodes in the page designer

$ref.description: Used together with definitions, an infinite loop renderer can be implemented.

id.description: The unique id of the component, mainly used for log collection

staticPlaceholder.description: Static display of empty value placeholder

staticLabelClassName.description: Static display of form item Label class name

staticInputClassName.description: Static display of form item Value class name

behavior.description: Component behavior and usage, such as create, update, remove

displayName.description: Component name, usually the business name for easy location

mock.description: Editor fake data for easy display

editorSetting.description: Editor configuration, can be ignored at runtime

useMobileUI.description: Can be used to turn off mobile style at the component level

actions.description: The button collection will be displayed at the bottom.

debug.description: Whether to enable debugging. When enabled, the form item data will be displayed at the top in real time.

ellipsisThreshold.description: Set the maximum display length of the string. Strings exceeding the length threshold will be truncated. Click value to switch the string display mode. The default is 120

initAsyncApi.description: The API used by Form to obtain initial data is different from initApi in that it will keep polling and requesting this interface until the finished attribute is returned as true.

initFinishedField.description: After setting initAsyncApi, by default, it will judge whether it is completed from the data.finished of the returned data. It can also be set to other xxx, and it will be obtained from data.xxx

initCheckInterval.description: After setting initAsyncApi, the default pull time interval

initFetchOn.description: It is recommended to change it to the sendOn attribute of the api.

interval.description: After setting, initApi will be called in a polling manner

persistDataKeys.description: Limit which keys are saved after turning on local cache

clearPersistDataAfterSubmit.description: Clear local cache after successful submission

api.description:
API used by Form to save data. 

Details: https://aisuda.bce.baidu.com/amis/zh-CN/components/form/index#%E8%A1%A8%E5%8D%95%E6%8F%90%E4%BA%A4

feedback.description: Form can also be configured with feedback.

asyncApi.description: After setting this attribute, after the form is submitted and the save interface is sent, the interface will continue to be polled and requested until the finished attribute is returned to true.

checkInterval.description: The time interval for polling requests, the default is 3 seconds. It is only valid if asyncApi is set

finishedField.description: If the field name that determines the end is not `finished`, please set this attribute, such as `is_success`

mode.description: Configure the default display mode of form items.

columnCount.description: Form items are displayed in several columns

horizontal.description: If it is horizontal typesetting, this attribute can refine the left and right width ratio of horizontal typesetting.

autoFocus.description: Whether to automatically focus the first form element.

messages.description: Message copy configuration, remember that this priority is the lowest. If your interface returns msg, the interface returns priority.

primaryField.description: Set the primary key id. After setting, only this data will be carried when checking whether the form is completed (asyncApi).

submitOnChange.description: Whether to submit the form directly when making changes.

submitOnInit.description: The form is submitted once initially, which is useful when linking

submitText.description: The default submit button name. If set to empty, the default button can be removed.

target.description: By default, the form submission itself will save the data by sending the api, but you can also set the name value of another form, or the name value of another `CRUD` model. If the target is a `Form`, the target `Form` will retrigger `initApi` and `schemaApi`, and the api can get the current form data. If the target is a `CRUD` model, the target model retriggers the search with the current Form data as the parameter.

wrapWithPanel.description: Whether to wrap it with panel

affixFooter.description: Whether to fix the bottom button to the bottom.

promptPageLeave.description: Page exit prompt, in order to prevent the page from accidentally jumping and causing the form to not be saved.

labelWidth.description: Label custom width, default unit is px
